website_summaries.verdict: The LG Volt 2 is a solid performer, but there are better options to sift through at this price.
pros: The LG Volt 2 is cheap and will run plenty of popular Android games and apps just fine
The phone also has Android Lollipop
cons: The camera churns out images that are dull and lifeless
Boost Mobile's performance in San Francisco is also sluggish
There's only about 4GB of storage space

customer_reviews.title: 😘😘😘❤️💜💖💚💙💪💪💪Strong Phone
customer_reviews.text: I have not had my new phone long enough to really know how good the phone is going to act. So far so good though. I really like the features that come with the phone. I'm with Boost Mobile services and so far I have been a happy customer. Getting use to the power buttons as well as volume buttons. A very strange place to put buttons on the back but oh well. I like Lg phones never had problems with lg . So it's all good for me.💯💯💯
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY G.

customer_reviews.title: Phone runs fine but in the bullet notes listing the products features ...
customer_reviews.text: Phone runs fine but in the bullet notes listing the products features it stated that the total available memory was 10GB. That is not even remotely true. The phones internal memory is 8GB and more than half of it is already used by "system programs" that can't be deleted. I can only load about 5 apps on my phone without having to delete one to install another.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Magee

customer_reviews.title: It works, if you don't add apps!
customer_reviews.text: I made a huge mistake buying this phone. I bought it because I needed something quick and didn't realize I had this phone about 4 years ago. I thought I was buying the next version from before, it worked fine although after two weeks I had to remove apps so it could update the O.S. 90% of memory was taken up by the O.S. Since I just missed the return window I will keep it as a emergency back-up phone
customer_reviews.author: Chad Hall

customer_reviews.title: I bought this phone about 5 years ago and my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone about 5 years ago and my mom still uses it today, Its actually outlasted a couple samsung phones I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Barker

customer_reviews.title: Screen
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had this phone for 6 months. Sitting in a recliner, phone on my lap, have an awesome case on it , jumped up phone fell, glass shattered. Can see the yellow partd inside of phone on some area. Cheap glass. Do not drop or do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: why

customer_reviews.title: Not always reliable
customer_reviews.text: Its a good phone, but what i happened to notice that for no reason the microphone will quit working. I've had my customers call me and not be able to hear me at all. Luckly i can still use the bluetooth in emergencies. It happens to the first version of volt and volt2.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice phone I had no problems with it I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice phone I had no problems with it I bought an LG ex power for the space and the processor this also is a very nice phone I've had it about a week very fast and you can download twice as much
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: ... if it was the phone or the carrier that sucked. I would get text messages hours after I ...
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure if it was the phone or the carrier that sucked. I would get text messages hours after I should have. My voicemails NEVER came to the voicemail app. I always had to call my voicemail to hear the messages. Sometimes I would have to switch between 3g and 4g to even send a message.
customer_reviews.author: V. Pediford

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product that barely functions. I just missed the return window as I tried to give it time, thinking I needed to review the manual or update software. It literally takes 10-15 seconds for the keyboard to appear, when you try to type something. VERY slow. For the price, you're better off getting the Moto for less, which function 100 times better than this. VERY DISAPPOINTING PRODUCT.

customer_reviews.title: Amera was really good but memory space for pic and apps
customer_reviews.text: Amera was really good but memory space for pic and apps sucked

customer_reviews.title: time will tell if the Boost mobile service and the LG Volt 2 are good enough to

customer_reviews.text: It is a great phone for the price but you can only use it on boost mobile it is stong i droped it before i got the case for it and it was fine the screen was not cracked the screen quailty is very good and there is good storage for the price point .
customer_reviews.author: Damanvir

customer_reviews.title: My phone is super fast and the camera is great
customer_reviews.text: My phone is super fast and the camera is great! And i love using my stylus with the phone too. I just love live love my new phone it beats my Kyocera hydro icon

customer_reviews.text: This product said it was new but when i opened it it was obviously used and refurbished. After talking to boost mobile they said they stopped making these phone 2 years ago and that I spent way ro much for this phone.

customer_reviews.text: Nice phone fast and i like the clicker on the back easy for taking photos as well as good 📷

customer_reviews.title: and text service is intermittent at best. Product did ship quickly though
customer_reviews.text: Barely runs pokemon go, and text service is intermittent at best. Product did ship quickly though, and I got a good deal on the price for the features.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a good phone so far, but it does come with very little memory avaialable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this phone very sturdy hard to crack when it falls
customer_reviews.author: L8yRose

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have a whole list of problems with this phone. I only have 8gbs internal memory and half of that is full of the system software. I thought that wasn't a big because I was getting a 32gb sd card. I found out that you can't install apps to the sd card. I can only move a small portion to the sd card. This phone only has 1gb ram. Which should be enough. I travel for work and I can't even run maps, for GPS, and Pandora or Iheartradio at the same time without it overheating and turning off on me. I would not recommend this phone to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolis P.

customer_reviews.title: Everything was defective so don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This phone was a lemon and stopped working almost immediately. Everything was defective so don't waste your money. I would give them 0 stars if I could. At this point, I can't open any apps, my gallery, or google.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone so much. Knock code is great to trick friends n all but its so useful. Camera is wonderful! Games run smoothly if you dont have a whole bunch of tabs up. Battery life kinda sucks though, even the lowest brightness is still bright. Although Im always on it so if youre not an active user you would be fine, but if youre always on your phone, you can make it through a school day, leaving at a about 30%. I would say if you need a phone for a good price LG Volt 2 is the way to go. :)

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really like my phone and the great price i got from amazon everything was professional
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money and get a better quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these Phones 1 for myself 1 for my wife. wife's phone was unable to receive calls exactly 30 days after purchase took to boost store phone was a lemon 2nd phone acting up after 40 days both are in cases not damaged just lemons from factory can use every function except Phone. Not a BOOST issue. Spend the extra money and get a better quality phone.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone!!
customer_reviews.text: This phone is great for someone who doesn't want to pay a lot on a phone or is new to smartphones. The lg volt 2 is fast and can handle many task. It runs apps very well but on intensive 3d games like jurassic world the game it is very laggy. The phone looks very expensive and sleek. It feels very good in the hand. Also the camera is good but you might need some lighting in low light enviroments for a good picture. Overall i would give this phone a 10/10 but only can give it a 5/5 on amazon great phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneontheInternet

customer_reviews.title: Solid value phone
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this phone just to use as an MP3 player. It works great. The buttons on the back took some getting used to, but this is a pretty snazzy phone for being under $100. I downloaded my amazon music library to a microSD card and connect this to my bluetooth speaker. Great little set up.
customer_reviews.author: Joneill

customer_reviews.title: great phone. beautiful screen quality
customer_reviews.text: great phone. beautiful screen quality, snappy processor and overall quality build. the camera could be a bit better but what more could you ask for at this price. Great choice for Boost users
customer_reviews.author: Gemayel L. Keyes

customer_reviews.title: O.K. phone but not for VR Applications.
customer_reviews.text: Nice phone for general usage. Suffers from the bloatware issues common to low end phones with limited storage space (about 2.5gb leftover). Camera is O.K. The power and volume buttons are on the back of the phone but are placed too close together. Turning off the phone often results in hitting the up volume & getting a lod blast of sound. The up volume button is also positioned right under the rear camera lens. Results in finger smudges on the lens when raising the volume. The phone does not have a gyroscope for virtual reality/Google Cardboard applications. Do not get this phone if you need this feature. Overall, a decent phone for general use at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: LockjawAl

customer_reviews.title: Great Volt 2
customer_reviews.text: So far this is the best lower end device I've ever used.I needed an upgrade from my stale moto.This device is 50 cheaper on Amazon than the carriers website. B warned phone has way too much bloat.sd card is a must
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Phone was Cheaper On Here! :)
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I thought this was going to be bigger than what it was, but I didn't read the product info correctly. I came out a little cheaper buying it on Amazon than what I was about to be charged going into Boost. I'm glad I opted for Amazon instead!

customer_reviews.title: Like the volt phone features

I would take pictures/videos with the phone and then couldn't view them, because the file type was unsupported.

I can't download things like Clash of Clans on this phone and still have it function properly. The only other problems I've had with this since buying it were related to my provider and not the phone itself.

customer_reviews.title: not as good as it seems
customer_reviews.text: product was dropped one time about 3 feet high... screen shattered completely... not as good as it seems.
customer_reviews.author: manuel

customer_reviews.title: A great phone for it's price point ($55 - +)
customer_reviews.text: An outstanding phone. Beautifully designed, crisp picture quality, battery life is about one of it's best features. Was able to watch 3 full length films on 1 charge. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because the quality of the speaker is below par and the resolution of the camera and the video is not HD quality. The phone generally sells at a price point of, $55.00 but it perfoms as if it were a much more expensive unit. As an everyday phone that does what it is suppossed to do, I highly recommend it but If you are looking for a top flight, high tech George Jetson trylark descrappler you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Canuco

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Boost Mobile Performer.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this phone so far. I recently upgraded from an LG Realm that had been dropped a few too many times. Along with a new OS and larger screen, I found the battery life much improved over the Realm. Now I have 4GLTE! I can honestly say that my phone is often much faster than my Frontier DSL home network. The only con I would have to say is the same as with the Realm is that call volume is not great if there is outside noise but its my only complaint and by far the best Android phone i've had thus far (this is phone #5 in 6 years).
customer_reviews.author: Jared Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but it doesn't suck either.
customer_reviews.text: Not great, but doesn't suck either. Nice-size screen, & is a decent choice for budget-minded light-to-medium smartphone users. If you use your phone as a do-everything-go-everywhere PC, then look elsewhere..... it simply isn't built for that. It handles video calls, TooYube, & surfing just fine. Spreadsheets are fine..... but games are hit or miss b/c the RAM is limited. Excellent choice if you need a phone that is modern, will run what you need it to run & occasionally can be pushed to its limits, but don't get upset if it lags when you do so. Again, great for light-to-medium everyday users. I'd recommend this to anyone who falls into this category.
customer_reviews.author: Macintosh User

customer_reviews.title: Meh.... camera is good i guess.
customer_reviews.text: Only a gig of ram so it's slow, processor isn't great, selfie camera is nice, back camera is very good, camera's are my only real like about the phone, battery is terrible... it's a low tier slow phone... only 8 gigs of storage so good luck having apps...

customer_reviews.text: After my Volt died I needed to replace it. I loved my Volt but I am actually GLAD it died. The Volt 2 is AWESOME. I can trim video. The camera is excellent. Totally worth my Volt dying and having to use my husband's for awhile. Which was not fun. Highly recommend. Upgrade today. It's worth it.

customer_reviews.title: Good phone great price
customer_reviews.text: Received my phone the next day although Amazon didnt send my micro sd card the next day as promised. Hopefully tomorrow. I know i can't download many apps or fully enjoy the phone until I can use my sd card but so far so good really nice phone. Nice camera. Smooth functioning. Im switching from a galaxy s3. I mainly use instagra, take pictures, and play about two games so I'm sure this phone will be a good fit for me. If your similar I definitely recommend this phone. good phone great price fast delivery. I'm satisfied thus far. Will update if any changes.

customer_reviews.title: Waisted money and time
customer_reviews.text: The camera isnt as discribed its had to get a cam app for taking pics the phone freezes and shuts of some times it wont come on have to open back and pull battery out and back to turn on boost zone has been updating since I bought it my text messages open slow and the phone when ur speaking makes key sounding noise my lg F7 was better in every way except that it was old and warn now I have to but a new phone soon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my uncle and he loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the lg volt which I regret now. I set my alarms which are crucial to my every day life and half the time the alarms don't go off even though They are set. Text messages mostly come through but about 20% of the time I don't recieve them. I was overall disappointed with this phone
customer_reviews.author: Harley Quinn

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone! However, I don't like the on/off key in the back right next to volume...a real pain. Looks like there is no perfect phone, but this one is close.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Pattie

customer_reviews.title: Great phone especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use as a tablet and I love it, it runs all games well and has a very smooth nice layout. Its button on the back is awesome. I used to always turn off or change the volume on accident but with this phone its not a problem. The slight curve is nice to. I got this phone without service. I would recomend a micro sd card with it because it only has 3 gb of space built in. I would not recommend this to put service on because most of the reviews say it doesn't work well but the phone itself is amazing especially for $60.
customer_reviews.author: Carson Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, sleek new body and operates faster
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Great phone, sleek new body and operates faster, better than Volt 1. Sounds very clear, not much bloatware, nice picture/screen quality. Would highly recommend, can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: lmttom

customer_reviews.title: But to be honesty it is a very well built smart phone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Only grip with the phone would be it's RAM. But to be honesty it is a very well built smart phone for the price. Camera is pretty solid and the speakers work well. It did take some getting use to the buttons on the back but it has grown on me.
customer_reviews.author: FO.

customer_reviews.title: Brand New in box love it
customer_reviews.text: Great phone nice big screen. Takes some getting used to having the buttons on the back though of your used to them being on the side like me. The power button is kinda hard to feel without looking at it. Otherwise I love this phone and the price is better then buying it directly from a Boost Mobile store and if you switch carriers like I did and transfered my phone number I got a $50 credit to my new Boost Account so it was like I paid only $50 for the phone and got to keep my number.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as Good as the Previous Model
customer_reviews.text: I honestly really liked the Lg Volt Boost Mobile phone better than this one because the previous version had the best customizable features (icons and themes), personizable LD light notifications, and more user friendly controls. What absolutely annoys me with this phone is that: 1) it DOES NOT have an alarm clock/timer the last time I checked 2) you can hardly customize anything (LD lights, icon themes, texting themes, etc) 3) SILENT MODE DOES NOT EXSIST so you would have to put it in airplane mode or something in a classroom setting *a good thing is if you're upgrading from the boost Volt to the Volt2, the older charger does work
customer_reviews.author: TamaGogo

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful interface and great os. My only complaints are the small internal storage (8gb) and the feel of the phone is a little cheap (weight-wise). But hey, it's only $70!

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone so much better then the lg volt 1.

The phone runs super fast and can jump from app to app with no problem. I am very satisfied with the LG. I have always had Samsung phones and love how similar yet different they are.

customer_reviews.author: Emily Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great phone, lots of apps and long battery life!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the LG Volt 2 for a friend of mine and he absolutely loves it!! It has a long battery life, many installed apps and he really likes that you can add even more memory. We both recommend this phone if you like to watch movies, videos on You Tube or even just playing Solitaire.
customer_reviews.author: starlitemoon1115

customer_reviews.title: The phone is good. the features are great
customer_reviews.text: Oops I filled out the wrong review on the case rather than the phone. The phone is good. the features are great. The camera is awesome and very clear. The only issue that I found, is that the volume is not very loud when on calls, I have to use the headset/headphones to hear the person through the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. For 50$ it's probably the best deal ...
customer_reviews.text: Great phone.For 50$ it's probably the best deal for a Boost mobile phone
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Pellegrino

customer_reviews.title: It's not the worst phone ever, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Runs, slow the keyboard only works half the time. Freezes constantly, turns off in the middle of a phone call, battery life is short, gets hot quickly. It's a decent size and had good memory and the camera isn't terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kyli Goley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Android phone and Boost works well too.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect phone for the basics of Android. Buy an SD card, and install before loading with applications to keep more storage open. Bluetooth is solid, as is WiFi. Not too big to use with a single hand for calling or txt-ing. Battery life is good. If you talk a lot carry the charge cable with you. Other bonus uses USB micro for charging so affordable if you need extras or need to replace. Camera is good too. Clean clear pictures every time.
customer_reviews.author: Loggerhead Navigation

customer_reviews.title: Good phone for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have another LG hone and this is an improvement. Be careful starting it up. If it starts in speaker mode it is hard to correct.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin F. DEHAVEN

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Not much difference from the original. Battery is nowhere near as good as original Volt model
customer_reviews.author: Robert A Risso

product_meta.title: LG Volt 2 (No Contract) Boost Mobile
product_meta.description: The LG Volt2 runs on the Android Lollipop 5.1 operating system. It has the Snapdragon 410 1.2Ghz Quad Core Processor and a large 5.0” HD IPS TFT display. It also has a 8MP Rear-Facing BSI Camera and 5MP Front-facing Camera. Includes Hands -Free Selfies with Gesture Shot and Soft Light.
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box
